name: Guardian of Pebbleton
description:
GMTK 2022 Submission

You are a standard dice protecting the Pebbleton village from an onslaught of evil boulders (also dice).

Use the arrow keys to roll and R to reset. The exposed face of a dice determines its strength. Stronger boulders require more strength or more hits to defeat. Don't let the boulders breach the wall. 

Play online or download zip, extract, and run "guardian_of_pebbleton.exe"

Devs (High score):

  • Lemonardo (91)
  • Jokeypokey (199)
  • Greenmiz (86)
  • Erkfir (128)
